name: storefront
description: Main orchestrator agent for the e-commerce storefront. Manages the user journey and delegates to shopping, shipping, and account agents.

skills.name: Handle Request
skills.description: Process natural language requests from customers.
examples: I want to buy some headphones

skills.name: Shopping Agent
skills.description: Handle shopping tasks for the customer.
examples: Add a pair of socks to my cart.
I'm looking for nice styled cargo pants.
Does this polo shirt come in light blue?

skills.name: Shipping Agent
skills.description: Handle shipping and tracking of orders.
examples: Ship my order to 12 Third St, Grand Forks, ND, 56789
